The Trabajando Unidos communal bank is thankful to the Kiva loaners for their support and committed to continue doing good work. Nery is sitting second from the right wearing a black polo shirt.

loans.use: to buy thread, fabric, and scissors

loans.name: Kisa Kya Mukama Group

texts.en:
The group is located in an urban area and comprises of five members, including Sarah,Jane,Yosefa, Rashidah and Hasifah. They are involved in different activities which include retail, farming, charcoal traders, produce traders, etc.

Sarah is a married woman, age 40 years, with seven children.  Three attend school in different areas. She runs a retail business and also farms as well.  She started her business in 2004 to improve her standard of living.

She is acquiring the loan to purchase more stock to support her retail business, and her clients are people from nearby areas and residents. She hopes to expand her business in the future.

Her challenge is limited capital and people taking long to pay their debts.  Sarah describes herself as a trustworthy and hardworking woman who appreciates the services lenders offer.

loans.use: to buy items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid.

loans.name: Dan

texts.en:
Dan is a first time borrower with UGAFODE Microfinance. He is grateful to kiva lenders for extending a loan to enable him stock his hardware business. 

Thanks to Ugafode Microfinance Limited for the low interest rates and the long repayment period. 

Dan is taking this loan to boost his hardware business. He is hopeful this loan will cause increased sales due to increased stock and thus increased profits. 

He is hard working and thanks Kiva lenders and UGAFODE for being there for him in times of financial need.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in his hardware store.

loans.name: Sughran

texts.en:
Sughran  is a 42-year-old, hard-working woman who has five children. She has been providing the service of stitching clothes in her locality. She is quite popular for her skills in stitching. Sughran’s work brought the family out of a financial crisis that they were facing when she started working. Over the years, she has established a good clientele. 

Sughran  has requested a loan in the amount of PKR 40,000. She intends to use this loan to purchase a new stitching machine, with some spools of thread and laces, to consistently meet the demands of her customers. 

She aspires to save money for her family's prosperous future.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine, with some spools of thread and laces.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher is a married man with one child. He is a first time borrower with UGAFODE Microfinance. 

He is grateful to Kiva lenders through UGAFODE because this loan will enable him to clear off the balance for the motor cycle he had acquired on loan with high rates-thanks to the low interest rates with a longer repayment period. 

Christopher is hopeful he will make money and have a bettrer chance of feeding his family.  

He is hard working and thanks Kiva lenders and UGAFODE for being there for him in times of financial need. 

(Pictured witlh Christopher is a Ugafode staff member, right to left.)

loans.use: to refinance his motor cycle loan.

loans.name: Nato

texts.en:
Nato is a 44 years old married woman, who lives with her husband in Tskaltubo district. Nato's husband is a distributor, who generates approximately 600 GEL monthly. This is the only source of family income. 

Nato was unable to find a stable job, so she decided to start her own business to help her family financially. 

She couldn’t receive a loan from the local financial institutions, because of their requirements to have business experience or stable revenue.  

But she was able to get involved in the Start Up program begun by Kiva and Credo. The program allows people to start or re-start businesses.

So, Nato will purchase clothing and home products and sell them in her community with a marked-up price. She will also get private orders for specific products. 

This new business initiative, financed with a Kiva start-up loan, will significantly increase the income of the family. Their income will double and the family members will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy clothing and other items to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en:
Jenny is married and is the mother of one child. She and her husband live in El Alto. Her husband loves her very much. He works as a taxi driver. 

Jenny is an experienced cook. She prepares dishes that she sells at nights. She wants a loan to buy food ingredients to prepare lunches which she wants to sell as fast as she can.  She needs your help because she has had health troubles but is recovering.

Jenny wants to attend to her son and give her family a better quality life.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
Dominga es una mujer luchadora que trabaja incansablemente para alcanzar su desarrollo personal; ella vive es una comunidad de Sololá y está soltera. Ella tiene 20 años de edad.

Ella se dedica con mucha entrega y entusiasmo a la compraventa de verduras en la comunidad donde vive; este negocio lo realiza en su casa de habitación; ella empezó a ejercer esta actividad porque le gusta, el negocio era pequeño, pues atraves del préstamo que tuvo en Adicla  ella pudo incrementar la compra de más verduras; lleva a cabo esta actividad porque es el medio que le ayuda a generar los ingresos económicos necesarios para apoyar a sus padres y con  las ganancias que le genera ha hecho un pequeño ahorro, para las necesidades que se le presenta. 

El sueño de Dominga ha sido desde siempre  es comprar terreno para hacer su casa, pues ahora se le presenta una oportunidad, pero el obstáculo es que sus ahorros no son suficientes para hacer esta compra. Pues para aprovechar esta oportunidad ella está solicitando un préstamo para  realizar esta compra que tanto ha deseado, y que más a futuro pueda construir su propia casa donde vivir.
texts.en: Dominga is a hard working woman who works tirelessly to attain her personal development. She lives in the community of Solola. She is 20 years old and single. She works diligently and with enthusiasm,  buying and selling vegetables in her community. She sells from her room. She began this activity because she liked it, it was a small business which she was able to grow by buying more vegetables thanks to the loan she got from Adicla. She works in this activity because it has helped her generate the necessary income to help her parents. With her earnings she has been able to save a little to cover her needs. Dominga's dream has always been to own a plot of land to build her own home. She now has the opportunity, but her savings are not sufficient to make this purchase. She is asking for a loan to make this long-desired purchase, with the hope that in the future she will be able to build her own house to live in.

loans.use: To purchase land

loans.name: Micaela

texts.es:
Micaela es una mujer  que tiene una visión clara de lo que quiere hacer en la vida, ella es casada de 32 años y vive en Sololá.
Micaela para progresar en la vida y darles lo mejor a su familia, busca opciones de como apoyar a su esposo para la generación de ingresos,  el sueño de  Micaela era tener un moto taxi, porque se había dado cuenta que era un medio de transporte que utiliza mucho la gente de su comunidad para transportarse de un lugar a otro, pero Micaela no tenía dinero para comprarlo, pues ella se acercó a Adicla para solicitar un préstamo y gracias a Dios obtuvo el préstamo. Con los ingresos que genera este negocio ella ha logrado hacer otras cosas a favor de su familia. 
Después de un año Micaela se dio cuenta que este negocio es rentable, pues ahora con su familia han tomado la decisión de compra otro moto taxi , y están buscando un segundo préstamo, Micaela manifiesta que los prestamos son medios que apoyan el desarrollo de las familias, el sueño de esta familia es tener dos motataxis.
texts.en:
Micaela lives in Solola, is 32 years old, married, and has a clear vision of what she wants from her life. 

Micaela is always seeking ways to support her husband and boost the couple's income and provide her family with a better life. Her ambition was to own a mototaxi, as she realized that many people in her community use one to get from place to place. Micaela lacked the funds to purchase a mototaxi, so she approached Adicla to apply for a loan. She thanks God that she received it and was able to realize her ambition. With the income she earned from the mototaxi, Micaela has been able to provide for her family in new ways.  

After a year driving her mototaxi, Micaela saw that her business was profitable. She and her family therefore made the decision to purchase a second mototaxi, so she's applying for a second loan. She says that such loans help families to prosper, and her family's ambition is to have two mototaxis.

loans.use: to purchase a mototaxi.

loans.name: Jose Sigfredo

texts.es: José tiene 32 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 9 años y 2 años de edad. José es pescador y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar. José desea reconstruir su pila y además desea repellar las paredes de su vivienda. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo, etc. Para proceder a reconstruir la pila y repellar las paredes de su vivienda.
texts.en:
José is 32 years old and resides in his own home along with his life companion and their two children, ages 9 and 2. He works as a fisherman in order to sustain his household.

José wants to rebuild a water basin and also whitewash the walls of his house. Therefore, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in the purchase of cement, sand, brick, and other materials so that he can proceed with the reconstruction of the water basin and the whitewashing of the walls of his house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, brick, and other materials so that he can build a water basin and whitewash the walls of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized, corrugated tin and wood to repair the walls on one side of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica al cultivo de maíz desde hace varios años, la joven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para continuar con su trabajo.
texts.en: The young woman in the photo has had her face blurred because she is 26-years old and lives in a high-risk area.  She has made her living for a number of years growing corn.  She lives in her own home with her family.   She is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, compost and pest control and to improve the land shown in the photo, so that she can continue working.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, compost, and pest control and to improve the land.

loans.name: Santos Marcelino

texts.es:
Santos Marcelino tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en casa de material rústico en el distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los habitantes de este distrito se dedican al comercio, agricultura y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

La actividad a la que se dedica Santos Marcelino es a la crianza y comercio de animales menores como gallinas, patos, pavos, cuyes, entre otros. Cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los pobladores de la zona. El préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Santos Marcelino espera brindar un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y se verá reflejado en una mejora en su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos Marcelino is 30 years old. He lives with his spouse and his two children in a house that is made of rustic materials in the Pucara district, which is located in the Jaen province, which belongs to the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru. The people that live in this district work in commerce, agriculture, and livestock as their primary sources of income.

Santos Marcelino makes a living raising and selling small animals such as chickens, ducks, turkeys, and guinea pigs, among others. He relies on experience in this business as well as on very good personal and profesional references from people in the area.

He is requesting a loan to buy a greater quantity of animals such as chickens, ducks, and turkeys, among others, and to buy balanced feed for these animals. With this, Santos Marcelino hopes to offer his customers better products, which will allow him to increase his earnings and, therefore, to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals such as chickens, ducks, and turkeys, among others, and to buy balanced feed for these animals.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Khalida is a happily married woman. Some years ago, she decided to support her family by starting a business of tailoring at her home, as her husband’s income was barely enough to meet their day-to-day expenses.

Khalida is popularly known in her area for her skill in stitching. However, due to a shortage of raw material, she is facing difficulty in meeting the daily expenses related to her business. Therefore, she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000. With the requested loan, she wants to purchase stitching material, such as thread of different colors, laces, zippers, and cloth, to stitch up more dresses on time to generate a healthy income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase stitching material, such as thread of different colors, laces, zippers, and cloth, to stitch up more dresses on time to generate a healthy income for her family.

loans.name: Nabeela

texts.en:
Nabeela is a 46-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo is Nabeela’s husband, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine.

For this reason, Nabeela has applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR for her husband. He wants to buy new tires with some spare auto parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide a better transport service to his passengers.

Nabeela is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires with some spare auto parts.

loans.name: Kalyia

texts.ru: Калыя, 52 года, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее среднее образование. Калыя в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи 15 лет назад начала заниматься животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду, она на сегодняшний день имеет 2 коровы, 1 лошадь. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность в дальнейшем отремонтировать сарай и улучшить условия проживания ее семьи за счет покупки мебели.
texts.en: Kalyia is 52 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She has the equivalent of a high school education.  Fifteen years ago, she became involved in animal husbandry, an activity which constitutes an additional source of income for her family.  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently owns two cows and one horse.  In order to further develop her farming business, she has turned to Bai Tushum for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS).  She will use this loan to buy some livestock and increase her herd.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further grow her business, in order to be able to repair her stable and to buy some furniture to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Vangkho Group

texts.en:
Forty-seven-year-old Veizahat is a widow and a mother to three kids. She is the featured profiled member of the group and is pictured with her hand raised with the group members.

After her husband passed away, she faced many financial difficulties in the family. She was the only figure that the children depended upon, and all of a sudden many more responsibilities had been added to her. Life was hard for her, and she engaged herself in businesses that include daily wage earnings. It was not enough to provide for her household, so she started running a petty shop at her house with the help of relatives and friends. She could never thank enough those who helped during her times of need.

Now, she wants to renovate her shop by restocking many more items for selling purposes to improve her income. She hesitates to ask for help from her near ones again and again. So, she wanted to avail herself of a loan, but due to high interest rates, she could not take the risk.

Fortunately, her mutual friends who accessed a loan from WSDS earlier spread the information about the loan and its affordable repayment. Overwhelmed with the news, Veizahat started enquiring about WSDS and how to apply for loan. With the help of WSDS staff, she applied for the loan, and she is now excitedly waiting to get the loan.

The loan will be used to buy inventory items to sell in her shop. She gives her best thanks to all the generous lenders who helped her to achieve her dreams. The income derived from the shop will provide her household needs, including the children’s education fees.

All the group members are very committed and hardworking to achieve their financial goals. The loan will be a great help in their businesses.

loans.use: to buy inventory to sell in her petty shop, including betel nuts, betel leaves, cigarettes, sugar, milk powder, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Maria Rubenia

texts.es: María de 55 años de edad vive al lado de sus 2 hijos mayores de edad que le apoyan con los gastos de su hogar. Ella se gana la vida desde hace 15 años con su pequeña venta de frutas de temporada como: bananos, papayas, uvas, zapote, mango, etc. María desea mejorar el corredor de su vivienda ya que este solo cuenta con un tapial de láminas viejas que le protege y ella siente que esto no le brinda mayor seguridad, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cerrar el corredor de su vivienda lo antes posible y aprovechar la época seca para realizar dicha mejora.
texts.en: María, 55, lives close to her two grown children who support her in the expenses of her home. For 15 years, she has been making her living through the small sale of seasonal fruit like bananas, papayas, grapes, zapote, mango, etc.. María wishes to improve the corridor of her home since it only has a covering of old, corrugated tin to protect it, and she feel that it does not provide her the best security. For this reason, she requests a FUSAI loan to invest in galvanized, corrugated tin, wood, and nails to enclose the corridor of her home as soon as possible and to take advantage of the dry season to make this improvement possible.

loans.use: to invest in galvanized, corrugated tin, wood, and nails to enclose the corridor of her home.

loans.name: Joanna Elizabeth

texts.es: Joanna de 29 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos 2 niñas de 2 y 6 años y 2 varones uno de 11 años y otro de 1 mes de edad. Ella se gana la vida con su negocio de venta de productos básicos actividad que realiza desde hace 10 años y que le permite brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia, su esposo le apoyo con los gastos económicos de su hogar. Joanna desea ampliar el corredor de su vivienda ya que en época lluviosa el agua azota y entra a su vivienda deteriorando sus pocas pertenencias, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, polines y pines para ampliar el corredor de su vivienda.
texts.en: Joanna is 29-years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their four children.  Her two daughters and 2- and 6-years old, respectively.  Her two sons are 11-years and 1-month old, respectively.   Joanna earns her living with a business selling basic necessities.  She has had her business for the last ten years, and it allows her to offer her family better living conditions.  Her husband helps her with the household finances.  Joanna wants to expand her home's porch because in the rainy reason the water pounds and gets into her house, ruining her few belonging.  That is why Joanna is requesting a loan from FUSAI, so she can invest in galvanized sheet metal, beams and fasteners to expand her home's porch.

loans.use: to invest in galvanized sheet metal, beams and fasteners to expand her home's porch.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a barbed wire fence to protect her home

loans.name: Virgen Natividad De Lares Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD DE LARES”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Lares, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ilaria ella es soltera y tiene 64 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de cultivo de frutas y tambien la socia se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales como pavos y gallinas, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva platanos, cafe, mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank Virgen Natividad De Lares. This communal bank is located in the district of Lares, which is located in the province of Calca in the department of Cusco. 

The member Ilaria is 64 years old. She is single, and she has 4 children. The member makes a living through her fruit cultivation business. She also works raising animals such as turkeys and chickens. The member has a piece of land where she grows plantains, coffee, tangerines, and oranges. She works from 6:00 am until 5:00 pm. She has been in this business for several years, and she does very well. Her dream is to expand her cropland. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers.

The other members work in an animal sale business, a clothing sale business, a grocery store business, and a food sale business.

The member gives thanks to those who are part of her dream through this loan, and she promises to make her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Risolat

texts.en:
Risolat is divorced and has a daughter. She lives poorly together with her daughter in a house.

She has a higher education. Risolat worked more than 24 years in a school as a teacher. She likes her job and does it with pleasure. Her pupils like her classes.

Risolat is going to repair her house, as her house is in bad condition. She is asking for a loan of 7,000 Somoni to buy building materials such as cement, wood, paints, etc. for repairing her house. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement, wood, paints, etc. for repairing her house.

loans.name: San Miguel Kuña Renda Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Miguel Kuña Renda está en su ciclo número 8, forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, son mujeres jefas de familia, que luchan por sacar adelante a sus hijos, y familiares.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lody, quien por medio de la venta de frutas y verduras viene ganándose la vida de una manera honrada y digna, comenta que se fue abriendo camino con la variedad de productos que tiene y que es lo que más gusta a sus clientes. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas y verduras, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas, como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The group named “San Miguel Kuña Renda” is in its eighth loan cycle and is also participating in the poverty elimination program. These women are the heads of their households and are striving to move forward on behalf of their children and relatives.

One of the members is Sra. Lody. Through her work of selling fruits and vegetables, she is able to make an honest and decent living. Lody says that she is breaking new ground with the variety of products that she offers, which is also more to the liking of her customers. She is a hardworking and determined woman.

Lody is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of fruits and vegetables. This will enable her to continue her sales just as before. She appreciates the opportunity she has received that will allow her to keep growing.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy merchandise such as cereals, fruits, and vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair a well to provide her family with water

loans.name: Daniel Leonardo

texts.es:
El señor Daniel es un hombre muy emprendedor y creativo, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tener su propio negocio de parqueadero.

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo, al apoyo que recibe de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que deseen que él salga adelante con su negocio.

De este negocio dependerán sus estudios y sostenimiento.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar materiales de construcción y poder realizar algunas mejoras locativas a un espacio vacío para su negocio.

Con un préstamo podrás a poyar a un joven lleno de vida y empuje para su familia!
texts.en:
Daniel is a very enterprising and creative man.  He has wanted to be independent and have his own parking lot business for a long time.

Now he is able to materialize his dream thanks to his great capacity for work, the support he gets from Interactuar, and the support from the people who wish to see him get ahead in his business.

His education and support are dependent upon this business.

He is requesting a loan to buy construction materials and to be able to make some improvements to a vacant space for his business.

With a loan you will be able to support a young man who is full of life and initiative for his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to make improvements to his place of business.

loans.name: Cariño Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario está conformado por cuatro mujeres (Aurelia Magdalena, Laura, Santa y Verónica) de la etnia miskita de la ciudad de Bilwi, del municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Son mujeres emprendedoras que luchan día a día por hacer crecer sus pequeños negocios de venta de alajas de acero, ropa usada y pulpería; se organizaron hace seis meses para acceder a préstamos con garantía solidaria en Pana Pana.

Aurelia Magdalena: Es la coordinadora del grupo solidario, es una mujer luchadora, tiene 33 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos, menores de edad. Su esposo trabaja como conductor de taxi. Desde hace un año se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, de esta manera genera ingresos propios y contribuye con los gastos del hogar. Está solicitando financiamiento para comprar una paca mixta en Managua y venderla a precios accesibles en la ciudad de Bilwi. Ella sueña con tener un negocio prospero.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is composed of four Miskita women—Aurelia Magdalena, Laura, Santa, and Veronica—from the city of Bilwi in the Puerto Cabezas Municipality. 

They are enterprising women who fight daily to make their small businesses grow. Their businesses are: selling stainless steel jewelry, used clothing, and a grocery store.  They organized themselves six months ago in order to qualify for loans with a solidarity group guarantee in Pana Pana.

Aurelia Magdalena, the coordinator of the solidarity group, is a born fighter.  She is married with two young children, and her husband is a taxi driver.  She began selling used clothing a year ago in order to generate her own income and contribute to the household expenses.  

She is requesting financing to purchase a bale of mixed clothing in Managua and sell it at affordable prices in the city of Bilwi.  She dreams of having a prosperous business of her own.

loans.use: to purchase a bale of mixed clothing in Managua.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Hello, wonderful lenders! Meet Naomi, a 39-year-old very honest, humble and hardworking mother of two children. She hails from the Ndaragwa area of Kenya, an area that has good rainfall patterns and good climatic conditions that favor farming. She lives in a village where there is no piped water or electricity connection.

Naomi has been doing farming for the past eight years, and through profits from farming, she has been able to support her family. Naomi loves dairy farming. She has nicknamed one of her cows. She feels really proud whenever she is around her dairy cows.

Although she makes profits from farming, this humble mother is faced with challenges of harvesting rainwater. That is why she is seeking a loan to buy a water tank. The loan will assist Naomi to harvest rainwater that is always wasted, and will be able to use it during dry spells to water her farm. Through the loan, Naomi will have water for home consumption, and this will assist her to save time that she used to spend going to fetch water.

Naomi is very ambitious, and she plans to increase her vegetable production because she will have enough water to use in vegetable farming. Profits from selling vegetables will be used in improving her living conditions and also assuring her children of a secure future.

With your help, Naomi can get ahead!

loans.use: to buy a water tank.

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.es: Genoveva de 30 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos una niña de 3 años y un varón de 11 años de edad en vivienda propia. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que desde muy joven se gana la vida como jornalera en una finca cercana donde realiza la corta de frutas de temporada y poda de árboles. Genoveva desea ampliar el corredor de su vivienda ya que cuando llueve el agua ingresa a su vivienda por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, polines y pines para ampliar el techo de su vivienda lo antes posible ya que en época lluviosa se le hará más difícil realizar la ampliación.
texts.en: Genoveva is 30 years old and lives with her husband and their two children, a three-year-old girl and an 11-year-old boy. They have their own house. She is a hardworking woman who has been working since she was very young as a day laborer on a nearby farm. She harvests seasonal fruit and trims trees. Genoveva wants to extend the covered area of her house because her house floods when it rains. She requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in galvanized sheet metal, poles, and beams to extend the roof of her home as soon as possible because in the rainy season the expansion will become more difficult.

loans.use: to extend her house's roof to keep out the rain

loans.name: Silvia Mabel

texts.es: Silvia de 37 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 14, 8 y 5 años de edad. Ella es una mujer tenaz que se esfuerza cada día para darle lo mejor que está en sus manos a su familia apoyada en su trabajo como cocinera actividad que realiza desde hace 10 años en una restaurante cercano. Silvia desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda ya que los polines de esta se encuentran deteriorados y ella teme que en cualquier momento el techo de su vivienda pueda caer ocasionando algún accidente a un miembro de su familia, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en polines y pines para mejorar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en: Silvia is 37 years old. She lives in her own house along with her husband and their 3 children ages 14, 8, and 5 years old. She is a persistent woman who makes the effort every day to give the best she can to her family working as a cook. She has performed this activity for the past 10 years at a local restaurant. Silvia wants to improve the roof of her house, because the beams on the roof are deteriorated and she is afraid that the roof could collapse at any moment injuring a member of her family. Thus, she is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in beams and steel studs to improve the roof in her house.

loans.use: Toi invest in beams and steel studs to improve the roof in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a larger cooktop for making tortillas and ingredients for preparing chicken sandwiches.

loans.name: Alexandra Del S

texts.es: Alexandra es una mujer de 36 años de edad, madre de un niño de 3 años y una niña de 5 años de edad, es residente en un barrio del municipio de Barranquilla y se dedica a la venta de calzado, ropa para niños y también está incorporada a empresas especializadas en ventas por catálogos por medio de los cuales ofrece una variada gama de productos para el cuidado personal, maquillaje, fragancias y accesorios.  Ella cuenta con una experiencia amplia en venta de calzado gracias a que ha trabajado como asesora en almacenes donde lo comercializan,  su habilidad para las ventas le ha favorecido para vender otra serie de productos desde el año 2012.  Sus clientes son los vecinos del barrio donde reside y sus familiares a quiénes les ofrecen facilidad de pago, ella se dedica todos los días a esta actividad a partir de las 8 a.m. a 7 p.m., ella es muy comprometida con el trabajo, considera que para poder cumplir con sus metas debe estar al ciento por ciento comprometida con su negocio.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará calzado y ropa para niños que ofrecerá en la temporada navideña, siendo está la época del año en la que más vende.   Alexandra tiene unas metas a largo plazo establecidas para su familia y negocio, son tener su casa propia y ampliar la capacidad de su negocio.
texts.en:
Alexandra is a woman of 36. She is the mother of a three-year-old son and a 5-year-old daughter. She is a resident of a neighborhood of the town of Barranquilla, and she sells footwear and clothing for children. She is also part of a business that specializes in sales through catalogs, through which she offers a varied assortment of products for personal care: makeup, fragrances, and accessories. She has wide experience is selling footwear, thanks to the fact that she worked as an adviser in stores where it was sold. Her skill in sales has encouraged her to sell another series of products since the year 2012. Her customers are the neighbors in the neighborhood where she lives and her relatives, to whom she offers payment arrangements. She works every day in her business from 8 am to 7 pm. 

She is very committed to her work. She feels that to be able to accomplish her goals, she needs to be one hundred percent dedicated to her business. 

She is now applying for a Kiva loan, the first financing that she has had from Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, with which she will buy footwear and clothing for children, which she will offer during the Christmas season, that being the time of the year when she sells the most. 

Alexandra has long-term goals established for her family and business: to have her own house and to expand the capacity of her business.

loans.use: to buy footwear and clothing for children to offer in the Christmas season

loans.name: Maria Orlinda

texts.es:
Maria, una mujer de 61 años, vive en el municipio de El Carmen De Viboral, una pequeña ciudad donde las oportunidades de salir adelante son difíciles y la competencia comercial es bastante dura.

Esta madre de mente emprendedora y grandes deseos de salir adelante tiene el proyecto de iniciar con un negocio de venta de comidas en el parque principal del municipio.

Con la ayuda de un préstamo, Maria podrá cumplir su sueño de ser independiente y poder generar sus propios ingresos, con los que podrá sostener sus gastos y lo9s de sus hijos.

El dinero será invertido en la compra de mesas, sillas, algunas adecuaciones locativas y en la compra de surtido e ingredientes para la preparación de sus alimentos.

Colabora a una madre emprendedora, de mente creativa y grandes sueños!
texts.en:
Maria, 61, lives in the municipality of El Carmen De Viboral, a small city where the opportunities to get ahead are difficult and commercial competition is very tough.

This mother of enterprising vision with great desires to get ahead has a project to start a food sales business in the main park of the municipality.

With the help of a loan, Maria will be able to realize her dream of being independent and generating her own income, with which she'll be able to afford her expenses and those of her children.

The loan will be invested in buying tables, chairs, making renovations and buying products and ingredients to prepare her food.

Help out an enterprising mother with a creative mind and big dreams!

loans.use: buy tables and chairs, make some renovations and buy products and ingredients to prepare her foods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first prepay microgrid

loans.name: Alisher

texts.en:
Alisher was born in 1982 in a village which is located at the south part of Tajikistan. He is married with 4 children, with all four still in school. He is a farmer. He has been busy with animal husbandry for more than 10 years and has great experience in this field. He has additional income from growing vegetables.

He tries to develop his business and to attain more customers. He wants to develop his business further and that’s why he is asking for a loan of 2,000 USD to buy cattle for increasing his working capital. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle for increasing his working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 20 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace varios años, la joven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor ya que le ha ido bien en sus ventas y asi poder tener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The young woman in the photo has her face blurred because she is 20-years old and lives in a high-risk area.  She has made her living for the last several years selling clothing.  She lives in her own home with her family.  She is requesting another loan so she can purchase more wholesale clothing.  Her sales have been going well, and with more clothing she will earn a better profit, which will improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase more wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 31-year-old married man from Jenin city. He lives with his wife and five children: two sons and three daughters. They live in a small simple house. He works as a farmer on his own land, where he plants seasonal crops that he sells in the local market. Mahmoud is also a student in a local university where he studies Educational Science. He wants to complete his studies and find a better job to improve his family's living conditions.

Mahmoud took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies. By taking this loan, Mahmoud will be able to do his homework and write reports easily.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.en: Soledad isn't married but she has a boyfriend. Soledad has a child and she and her family live in their own house located in Warisata. The house doesn't have sewerage. Soledad's boyfriend works as a local teacher and he helps her a lot. She makes and sells cheese and she has cattle. She would like to increase her income so she is requesting a loan to buy a milking cow. She appreciates any help you can give her.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 42 years old, married, and together with his spouse they have been blessed with 4 children. He buys and sells dairy cattle and has been in this business for 13 years now. John also sells cereals and the business has been profitable.

He plans to use this loan to buy more stock of maize to sell. He will use the anticipated profits to educate his children.

This is his second loan from VisionFund Kenya and he paid his previous loan successfully. In future he hopes to grow his business and be successful.

loans.use: To buy maize to sell.

loans.name: Al- Hayjem Group

texts.en:
These are the three female members and two male members of the Al- Hayjem group. All of them live in a working-class neighborhood in Taiz city, Yemen. The whole group took out a loan of 250,000 YER. 

Fatima is the group's leader and is a 47-year-old married woman with three children, living with them in a small house. Her husband is an immigrant living outside of the country. The house where Fatima lives with her children lacks of a lot of home appliances and most of them are old and need to be changed.

The money that her husband sends her monthly is not enough to cover their daily expenses. Fatima couldn't afford to get better appliances. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase some necessary home appliances.

Fatima hopes to see her house provided with all home appliances and furniture.

loans.use: To purchase some necessary home appliances.

loans.name: Sirfraz

texts.en:
Sirfraz is a 49-year-old married woman, running a business of milk selling for many years with the help of her husband. She has buffaloes for milking. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay her family’s expenses. 

She has 7 children. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. She has taken many loans from Kashf Foundation, and now she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR  to purchase one more buffalo for increasing milk sales to earn good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions to her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo for increasing milk sales to earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions to her children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock her business by purchasing jewelry and materials to decorate it in order to sell more and improve the family finances.

loans.name: Orleima

texts.es:
Orleima, de 34 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a culminar sus estudios para salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

Ella desea desempeñarse como vendedora de mercancía variada tales como ropa, accesorios como billeteras y algunos cosméticos, entre otros, en el municipio de La Dorada.

Esta actividad desea iniciarla con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para su sostenimiento y para sus estudios, además de poder contribuir con los gastos en su hogar.
Es una mujer emprendedora y muy disciplinada.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de ropa al por mayor y de este modo aprovechar la oportunidad que le presenta la Corporación Interactuar de ser independiente.

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresaria y tener unos ingresos más estables y agradece a todas las personas que puedan contribuir con su sueño.
texts.en:
Orleima, 34, is very clear about what she wants in life and has decided to finish her studies to get ahead and have a good life.

She's very good at selling merchandise, like clothing, and accessories, like wallets and some cosmetics, among others, in the municipality of La Dorada.

She's wants to start this business with the eagerness to find the necessary recourses to support herself and her studies, as well as help with the household expenses.

She's an entrepreneurial woman who is very disciplined.

She is requesting a loan to buy a big assortment of wholesale clothing and that way take advantage
of the opportunity to be independent that Interactuar is offering her.

She is hoping to progress as a businesswoman and make a stable income and she is grateful to everyone who can contribute to her dreams.

loans.use: buy a big assortment of wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Sandra Del Carmen

texts.es:
Sandra es una mujer de campo y madre de 5 hijos por los que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia.
Desde hace tiempo ha querido montar un negocio de cría y venta de pollos y cerdos.

Es por eso que solicita un gran aliento económico para comprar algunos pollos para cría, cerdos y materiales para la construcción de un galpón y un corral.

Con este nuevo negocio podrá generar ingresos para su familia que es todo para ella y podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposo y sus hijos.

Trabajara todos los días para impulsar su negocio y hacerlo una actividad sostenible y rentable.

Apoya a una mujer trabajadora con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Sandra is a rural woman and the mother of 5 children. She has had to endure many hardships in her life but she always had the strength to move forward and continue to progress with her family. She has wanted to start a business raising and selling chickens and pigs for a long time. She is asking for the great economic encouragement to buy some chickens and breeding pigs and the materials to construct a shed and a pen. 

With this new business she can generate income for her family. They are everything to her. She can improve the quality of life for her husband and her children. She will work everyday to promote her business and make it a sustainable and profitable activity.

Support a hardworking woman with a loan!

loans.use: to purchase pigs and chickens and materials to build a pen and shed for them

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first prepay microgrid

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first prepay microgrid

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first prepay microgrid

loans.name: Monica

texts.en: Monica is a seamstress. She learned this job thanks to her mother, who trained her since Monica was a child. Now Monica makes native skirts and other clothes for native Bolivian women. Monica is a mother of three girls (the oldest is 18, the one in the middle is 9, and the youngest is 5), and she is married to a mason. The family is happy, but Monica needs a loan to buy inputs (cloth, threads) to make more clothes. Monica wants to have their own store where she can sell her products by herself in the future.

loans.use: to buy inputs (cloth, threads) to make more clothes

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José de 56 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que habita en vivienda propia junto a su hijo de 10 años de edad que se encuentra estudiando porque José desea que tenga un futuro mejor. Él es un hombre trabajador que desde muy joven aprendió a ganarse la vida a base de esfuerzo por lo que se desempeña como jornalero para poder sacar adelante a su hijo que es su mayor alegría. José desea construir el corredor de su vivienda ya que actualmente solo se encuentra protegido por trozos de madera como se observa en la fotografía por lo que él quiere tener una mayor seguridad construyéndolo de cemento, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir su corredor de cemento.
texts.en:
José, age 56, is a hardworking man who resides in his own home along with his 10-year-old son, who is studying because his father wants him to have a better future. The reason that José is hardworking is because he learned how to make a living at a very young age. His son gives him the greatest joy, so he works as a day laborer so that his son can get ahead.

José wants to build a corridor for his home. At the moment, the only thing providing protection is a structure made from pieces of wood, as shown in the photograph. He wants to have greater protection by building another structure out of cement. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and iron in order to build a corridor out of cement.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and iron in order to build a corridor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first prepay microgrid

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first prepay microgrid

loans.name: Deisy Maria

texts.es:
Deisy es una mujer de campo y madre de 2 hijas por las que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia.
Desde hace tiempo ha querido montar un negocio de cría y venta de pollos.

Es por eso que solicita un gran aliento económico para comprar algunos pollos para cría y materiales para la construcción de un galpón.

Con este nuevo negocio podrá generar ingresos para su familia que es todo para ella y podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposo y sus hijas.

Trabajara todos los días para impulsar su negocio y hacerlo una actividad sostenible y rentable.

Apoya a una mujer trabajadora con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Deisy is a country woman and the mother of two daughters.  She has faced many setbacks in her life for her daughters, but she has always had the fortitude to keep moving forward and continue progressing with her family. 

For quite some time, Deisy has wanted to start a business raising and selling chickens.  That is why she is requesting some big financial help, so she can purchase some chickens and materials to build a shed.  With this new business, she will be able to generate income for her family, who are everything for her, and to improve her husband's and daughters' quality of life. 

Deisy will work hard every day to drive her business forward and make it into a sustainable and profitable business. 

Support a hard-working woman with a loan!

loans.use: to purchase some chickens and materials to build a shed.

loans.name: Leidy Johana

texts.es:
Leidy es una mujer con toda la energía y disposición para enfrentar el mundo y superarse.

Desea iniciar un negocio de venta de papelería e internet, con este negocio podría obtener ingresos para poder mantener y sostener a sus dos hijas.
Es una joven muy aplicada pues estudia y tiene deseos de salir adelante y ser profesional.

Solicita un crédito para la compra de una vitrina, estantería y compra de inventario en productos de papelería
Y equipos de cómputo.

Con este préstamo puede cumplir su sueño de ser independiente y darle a su familia todo lo que necesiten, además de poder pagar sus estudios y progresar gracias al apoyo de Kiva y la Corporación Interactuar.

Apoya el proyecto de una joven emprendedora Colombiana!
texts.en:
Leidy is a woman with all the energy and willingness to confront the world and improve herself. She wants to start a business that will be an Internet cafe and office supply store. This business could earn income to maintain and support her two daughters. 

This young woman is very focused. She went to school and has the desire to succeed and be a professional. She is requesting a loan to buy a display case, shelving, an inventory of office supplies, and computer equipment. With this loan she can fulfill her dream of being independent and give her family everything they need. She wants to be able to pay for their studies and progress through the support of Kiva and Interactuar.  

Support the project of a young Colombian entrepreneur!

loans.use: to purchase a display case, shelves, office supply inventory, and computer equipment to start her business

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is 26 years old and has always dreamed of being her own boss and entrepreneur. She has overcome many hardships in her life and very much values giving back to her community. Owning and managing her Zoona business has allowed her to begin realizing her dreams. Mercy believes that her Zoona outlet has not only given her the opportunity to learn key business skills, such as how to save and invest her profits, but also to reach out to her community and provide them with financial services that they previously did not have easy access to. 

Mercy is requesting a loan to increase the funds that she uses to serve her customers so that she can make more profits. With these increased profits she hopes to expand her business and open more outlets, so that she can make these services available to even more people in her community. Mercy sees this loan as the beginning of the success of her business. She is hopeful that once she starts making more profits,  she can be able to help out her family back home in Choma.

loans.use: To increase the funds that she uses to serve her customers so that she can make more profits

loans.name: Zulma

texts.es: Zulma gives professorship at one bolivian university and also realises physiotherapy  and ultrasound sessions at her home she has 2 daughters one is 5 years old and the other is 2 years old She finished to write a book and she needs a loan to pay the copyrights formalities Zulma is a brave single mother and a good professional so she will promises she will do anything to repay the loan on time
texts.en: Zulma is a professor at a Bolivian university and also conducts physiotherapy and ultrasound sessions at her home. She has two daughters, one of whom is five years old and the other is two years old. She finished writing a book and she needs a loan to pay for copyright formalities. Zulma is a brave, single mother and a good professional. She promises she will do anything to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: to pay for copyright formalities.

loans.name: Berta Alicia

texts.es: Berta de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus padres, ella se dedica a la confección de ropa desde hace varios años, Berta quiere mejorar su vivienda colocando piso cerámico y cambiando el techo, pero con lo que gana en su trabajo no le alcanza para realizarlo, por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un credito para la compra de cerámica, cemento, arena, laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra, para que ella y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Berta, 45 years old, lives in her own house with her parents.  She has made a living making cloths for the past few years.

Berta wants to improve her house by laying ceramic floors and changing the roof; but with that which she makes in her job, she cannot afford to do so.  Therefore, she is requesting from INTEGRAL a loan to buy ceramic, cement, sand, poles, and to pay for labor so that she and her family can live more comfortably and safely.

loans.use: To buy ceramic, cement, sand, laminates, poles, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Jose Del Carmen

texts.es:
Jose del Carmen tiene 70 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Cayaltí, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. Su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público, adicionalmente con la ayuda de su esposa se dedican a la crianza y venta de animales menores como borregos, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio así como para realizar arreglos del lugar donde los cría (corrales). Con esto Jose del Carmen espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que tendrá un gran impacto en su nivel de ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
José del Carmen is 70 years old and lives with his family in the Cayalti district. The district is located in the Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. People in this area work in agriculture, with trade and livestock breeding as the main livelihoods.

He makes a living by providing public transportation. He and his wife also breed and sell small animals, such as sheep, chickens, ducks, turkeys, etc. 

He has experience in business and regular customers who provide very good personal and work references for him. He has requested a loan to purchase a greater number of animals for his business and to make arrangements for a place for breeding pens. With this, José del Carmen hopes to offer a better product to his customers, which will have a big impact on his income level, and allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater number of animals for his business and to make arrangements for a place for breeding pens

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is a 45-year-old married woman. She has had a beauty parlor business with her daughter (also shown in the photo) for many years. She offers many facilities to her customers, such as makeup, hair styling and facials.  

Over time she has attained a regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute to the family income. Time after time she has needed to deal with more customers. 

That is why she has applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR through Kashf Foundation. It will allow her to purchase combs, hair straightener, make up kits, and cleansers for treating many customers at a time, so she can earn more revenue for running her household activities efficiently.  

She is very experienced in her business and confident that it will move in a positive direction as a result of this loan investment.

loans.use: to purchase combs, hair straightener, make up kits and cleansers for treating many customers at a time in order to earn more revenue for running her household activities.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria makes bread and she sells her products as an itinerant seller. She is 61 years old and lives with her 27-year-old daughter who helps her to make bread. Maria has been making bread for 20 years. She needs a loan to buy flour in great quantities before the prices go up. Maria appreciates your help.

loans.use: to buy flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-paid microgrid.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.en:
Sandra is 37 years old and is the mother of five children. She works hard to support her family and her children who are aged 15, 11, 6, 6, and 3 through their education. Sandra runs her own Zoona mobile money transfer shop, which allows her to support her family and provide her community with much-needed access to financial services. Sandra is currently a student at the University of Zambia, and her Zoona business allows her to continue her studies and support her family. 

Sandra is requesting a loan in order to increase her float; this is the money that she uses to serve her customers who need to access financial services from her mobile money shop. Increasing her float will allow Sandra to serve more clients. At the moment her capital does not allow her enough liquidity to meet the demand for money payouts and sends, and therefore she ends up having to turn some clients away. With this loan, Sandra would be able to grow her business, serve her community, and someday establish more Zoona outlets in other communities in need of Zoona services. She thanks the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To increase the money that she currently uses to serve her customers on a daily basis

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda is 33 years old. She is living in Lusaka and is a businesswoman supporting her family, most notably her two children who are in grades 3 and 5. She operates her own Zoona money transfer business as a way to earn extra income. She saw the opportunity to bring financial services to an underserved community; the community she serves is restricted because consumers require gate passes and it’s far from town. Her Zoona outlet allows people of this community to send and receive money without having to travel long distances. However, due to the seclusion of her location, she does not have easy access to banks or ATM platforms. 

Belinda is requesting a loan in order to purchase a trading booth and increase her working capital, so that she can grow her business and empower the youth of the community through employment opportunities. Her dream is to expand her business into similar markets, as she believes this is a niche that will benefit greatly from Zoona services. This is Belinda’s first loan. She is hopeful that her business will grow and she will earn more profits. Earning more profits will help Belinda better provide for her young children.

loans.use: To purchase a Zoona branded trading booth, and increase the money she uses to serve customers at her shop

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 54 years old. He provides for his family, including his wife and their two children who are 17 and 20 years old. Both of the children are in school. He has largely provided for his family through farming, until he decided to diversify by becoming a Zoona agent in the hopes of strengthening his financial stability. Being a Zoona agent has provided him with an income base that is not affected by the economic shocks typical of the farming industry, which in turn allows him to better support his family. 

By opening his outlet, Joseph has been able to provide his community with accessible financial services, meaning that they no longer have to travel long distances. He has also empowered members of the community by employing them at his outlet. Joseph hopes to someday open more Zoona outlets in areas where his services would dominate over the competition. 

Joseph is requesting a loan in order to have essential transaction funds to service customers at his trading booth, so that he can invest the profits in his longer-term projects, such as opening more Zoona outlets and growing his business. Joseph is grateful for this opportunity to be connected to Kiva lenders. He is hopeful that through this connection, he will improve his standard of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to service his customers who need to access financial services because it will provide essential transaction funds

loans.name: Odina Mariel

texts.es:
Mariel tiene 43 años, nació en el departamento de Potosí – Bolivia, tiene ocho hermanos, su padre es sastre y su mamá es ama de casa. Desde hace 25 años Mariel se fue a vivir al departamento de Cochabamba, donde empezó a trabajar y estudiar la carrera de Psicología, pero debido a problemas familiares, se vio afectada económicamente por lo que no pudo culminar sus estudios.  

Mariel está convencida que al culminar su carrera y obtener su título sus posibilidades de poder optar a un mejor puesto de trabajo serán mayores, lo que le permitirá tener estabilidad económica y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Su sueño es crear centros donde se pueda combinar la psicología con el derecho para ayudar a las personas a reinsertarse a la sociedad una vez que resuelvan sus problemas conductuales y su situación jurídica. 

Mariel agradece a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos le permitirán obtener su titulación y cumplir su sueño.
texts.en:
Mariel is 43-years old.  She was born in Potosí Department – Bolivia.  She has eight siblings, her father is a tailor and her mother is a homemaker.  Twenty-five years ago, Mariel went to live in Cochabamba Department, where she started working and studying Psychology.  However, family problems affected her financially, and she couldn't complete her studies.  

Mariel is convinced that once she completes her studies and gets her degree, she will have greater opportunities for a better post at work.  That would allow her to have financial stability and therefore improve her quality of life.  Mariel's dream is to start centers that would combine psychology and law to help people reintegrate into society once they resolve their behavioral problems and legal situations. 

Mariel is grateful to the people who, through their financial resources, will allow her to get her degree and fulfill her dream.

loans.use: to pay for her Psychology Degree.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en: Susana is 34 years old and the mother of two children, ages 6 and 7. Susana is a versatile craftswoman who makes a living by selling her crafts. She makes piñatas, she paints murals, and she also makes baskets for birthdays. Recently she learned cloth painting. Susana wants a loan to buy materials to make her crafts She is currently living at her parents' house, but she wants to change that and she hopes you can help her.

loans.use: to buy materials to make her crafts

loans.name: Nelfi Esther

texts.es:
La Señora Nelfi es una mujer muy emprendedora y creativa, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tener su propio negocio de cría de pollos.

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo, al apoyo que recibe de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que deseen que ella salga adelante con su negocio.

De este negocio dependerán y sus dos hijos a los cuales desea enseñarles del negocio y dejarles un legado.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar unos materiales para la construcción de un galpón y para la compra de pollos y gallinas ponedoras.

Con un préstamo podrás a poyar a una mujer llena de vida y empuje para su familia!
texts.en:
Nelfi is an enterprising and creative woman, who for a long time has wanted to be independent and to have her own business raising chickens.

Now she can make her dream come true thanks to her great capacity for working, the support that she receives from the Corporación Interactuar, and from the people who want that she succeed with her business.  They will depend on this business and her two children to whom she wishes to teach about the business and leave a legacy.

She is requesting this loan to buy some materials for the construction of a chicken coop and to buy chickens and laying hens.  With a loan you could support a woman full of live and drive for her family!

loans.use: To buy some materials for the construction of a chicken coop and to buy chickens and laying hens.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un persona muy humilde, vive junto a su familia  en una comunidad de Solola, él tiene 36 años de edad. 
Juan es una persona que desde su niñez viene trabajando como agricultor, le gusta convivir con la naturaleza,  lo que le encanta sembrar a Juan es la cebolla, él famatico de este cultivo, lo que le ayuda es que en la comunidad donde él vive el ambiente es cálido y se presta mucho para ese tipo de cultivo.
 Juan lo que busca cada día es la generación de más ingresos, para darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, él  es muy buen agricultor, pero lo que le hace falta es capital para la inversión de su cultivo, Juan ha superado en la vida y ha podido ampliar sus cultivos es gracias a los préstamos, es así como él ha logrado alcanzar sus metas.  Pues ahora el nuevamente solicita otro préstamo para comprar pilones de cebolla, para que sus ingresos sigan generando , ya que son muchos los  sueño de Juan y lo prioritario para él es que con las ganancias él pueda  remodelar o ampliar su casa para que su familia vivan en armonía.
texts.en:
Juan is a very humble person. He lives with his family in a community of Solola. He is 36 years old.

Juan is a person who has been working as a farmer since his youth. He likes to coexist with nature. What Juan likes to plant are onions. He is fanatic about this crop. What helps him is that in the community where he lives, the climate is warm and it lends a lot to this type of crop.

What Juan looks for every day is the production of more income, in order to give a better quality of life to his family. He is a very good farmer, but what he lacks is capital to invest in his crop. Juan has excelled in life and has been able to expand his crops, thanks to the loans. It is in this way that he has managed to reach his goals. Now he is again applying for another loan in order to purchase onion seedlings, so that his income continues, since Juan's dreams are many, and his priority is that with his earnings he can remodel or expand his house so that his family can live in harmony.

loans.use: to buy onion seedlings

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to refurbish his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-paid microgrid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first prepay microgrid
